metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1779 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When dynamic templates are used (OTRSTicketForms), admin can use OTRS tags which are not masked properly and can reveal sensitive information. This issue affects: OTRS AG OTRSTicketForms 6.0.x version 6.0.40 and prior versions; 7.0.x version 7.0.29 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.3 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
